data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Bleed Em Out
data.description: Your target suffers 500 damage over the next 10 seconds. The damage will start low, and increase as the effect continues.

data.name: Bloodlust
data.description: All your Exhaustive Blows have a 25% chance to restore 225 hit points.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Bring Da Pain!
data.description: Each time that you attack an enemy within the next 10 seconds, Any group member within 100 feet will have their Weapon Skill increased by 1, but your Initiative will also be reduced by 1 for the next 10 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to three times.

data.name: Bring It On
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, each time you are hit with an attack you will do 194 damage back to the attacker. This effect can only be triggered once every second.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Can't Stop Da Chop
data.description: You chop at your enemy, dealing 141 damage and reducing the value of incoming heals on them by 50% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 7 seconds. If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chop Fasta!
data.description: Group members within 100 feet are inspired by the way you shrug off the blows, for the next 10 seconds any ability used by your groupmates will cool down 5 seconds faster.

data.name: Chop Til You Drop
data.description: Get Stuck In's cooldown timer is lowered by 10 seconds.

data.name: Come and Git It!
data.description: Increases your Toughness by 25 for each enemy within 20 feet, up to a maximum of 6 enemies, for 10 seconds.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Dat Tickles!
data.description: Absorbs 3600 damage for up to 20 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Don't Go Nowhere
data.description: A maiming attack which deals 141 damage to the target and snares them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Don't Hate Da Choppa
data.description: All attacks will generate 25% less hate.

data.name: Don't Wanna Live Foreva
data.description: Increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.

data.name: Drop Da Basha
data.note: Requires Target to have Parried or Blocked
data.description: Your attacks become more precise, your target's chance to block or parry is reduced by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Easy Killin'
data.description: Reduces the Action Point costs by 5 points in Furious state and 10 points in Berserk state.

data.name: Extra Choppin'
data.description: Lotsa Choppin' will affect 9 targets within 30 feet and reduces the base damage by 20%.

data.name: Faultfinder
data.description: Increases friendly ram damage by 2% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Finish 'Em Faster
data.description: Cooldowns on your Exhaustive Blows are reduced by 25%.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 104 damage.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Furious Choppin'
data.description: A merciless strike of attacks that repeatedly hits your target for up to 5 seconds, dealing up to 194 damage. You will be healed for all damage this ability deals.

data.name: Git Stuck In
data.description: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Auto attack speed is increased by 35% for 20 seconds for all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Git To Da Choppa
data.note:
Requires Dual Wield
Requires 13 points in Path of Da' Wrecka
data.description: You frantically lash out at everything nearby for up to 6 seconds, dealing 138 damage every 2 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet. Each time you deal damage, you'll randomly pull one of the victims in towards you.

data.name: Go For Da Soft Spot
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: You deal 216 damage to your enemy.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Hurtin' Time
data.description: While this ability is active, your melee attacks will deal an additional 100 damage , but you will also suffer 50 damage each time.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: I'm Still Here
data.description: Increases the duration of Come An' Git It and Try An' Hurt Me by 5 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Keep It Comin'
data.description: When you die, you have a 25% chance of ressurecting at 25% health and unleashing a blow to all enemies within 40 feet and dealing 250 damage.

data.name: Keep On Choppin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires 5 points in Path of Da' Savage
data.description:
You chop deeply into your enemy, dealing 191 damage. Your love of battle fills you with energy, restoring 100 Action Points.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Long Lasta
data.description: Any time your Exhaustive Blow gets defended, for the next 6 seconds all attacks will cost 0 action points.

data.name: Longer and Stronger
data.description: While you are Furious, you regain 100 health every 4 seconds. While you are Berserk, you regain 175 health every 4 seconds.

data.name: Lotsa Choppin
data.description: You wildly swing at enemies in front of you within 25 feet, dealing anywhere from 61 damage to 69 damage. May only hit up to three targets.

data.name: No More Helpin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 13 points in Path of Da' Hitta
data.description:
A brutal attack which deals 266 damage to the target. For the next 10 seconds, any healing abilities that they use will be 50% as effective.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Outta My Face!
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds. During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Reckless Blow
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
Deals 191 damage and for 10 seconds, your chance to be critically hit will be increased by 5%.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Red goes faster!
data.description: While Berserk, all cooldowns are reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 253 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description: Any roots or snares are removed, as all attempts to impede your movement are futile. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Siege Wrecker
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You sabotage a siege ram, causing the ram to deal 98% of the original damage for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Sit Down!
data.description: Deals 166 damage and knocks down the target for 2 seconds. The attack is undefendable.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Slasha
data.description: A furious slash that deals 191 damage and reduces your target's Toughness by 25 for 9 seconds. This effect is stackable up to three times.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Stomp Da Yard
data.description: You stomp the ground, knocking down targets within 30 feet for 3 seconds and dealing 1200 damage.

data.name: Strong Finish
data.description: Increases the chance to critically hit with Path of Da' Big Hitta abilities by 15%.

data.name: Supa Chop
data.description: Deals 1800 damage and reduces Action Point costs by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Tantrum
data.description: You deal an additional 300 damage, whenever you use an ability. This effect will fade after you damage 8 targets.

data.name: Throat Slasha
data.description: You slash at your opponent's throat, immediately inflicting 108 damage. The wound continues to bleed for 132 damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Tired Already?
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires 9 points in Path of Da' Hitta
data.description:
You chop your target in a vital organ, dealing 166 damage. For the next 10 seconds, any abilities that they use will take an additional 5 seconds to cooldown.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Try An' Hurt Me
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
An exhaustive blow that deals 141 damage and reduces your target's chance to critically hit by 100% for 10 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Was Dat Yer Finger?
data.description: When you do critical damage, reduces your target's Weapon Skill by 120 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Weaklin' Killa
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
You unleash a powerful blow, dealing 291 damage.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Wear Em Down
data.description: Your Exhaustive Blows have a 50% chance of returning 25% of your Rage.

data.name: We'z Fightin' Betta
data.description: Your rage inspires all around, causing groupmates' attacks to deal an additional 200 damage for 10 seconds while within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Wild Choppin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You strike enemies within 30 feet, dealing anywhere from 40 damage to 60 damage.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Wot Rules?
data.description: Exhaustive Blows will no longer remove your Rage.

data.name: Wot's Da Rush?
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Dual Wield
Requires 5 points in Path of Da' Wrecka
data.description:
You lash out at all enemies within 30 feet, inflicting 105 damage. All of the victims will also become snared, reducing their run speed anywhere from 10% to 40% for up to 9 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Yer All Bleedin' Now
data.description: You swipe at the enemies in front of you, dealing 112 over 9 seconds to enemies within 40 feet.

data.name: Yer Gettin' Soft
data.description: When your attacks get defended, increases your chance to critically hit with Path of Da' Savage abilities by 100% for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Yer Goin Down!
data.description: You chop all enemies within 30 feet for 800 damage and all heals are reduced by 50% for 10 seconds.
